Name: Cathode Cattail
Description: Cathode Cattail is a quirky member of the WebtrES club, known for its vibrant orange casing and an old-school charm with classic buttons. It stands out in any crowd with its cat-like limbs that gracefully carry its boxy frame. The red and black screen flickers with digital patterns that reflect Cathode's mysterious and mischievous nature. Born in the neon-lit backstreets of the digital world, Cathode enjoys pouncing on unsuspecting data packets and curling up on warm server racks. With a purr that resonates through cyberspace, Cathode Cattail has become both a legend and a guardian of the WebtrES club's digital frontier.
